snippet: The Environmental Protection Agency gave Texas authority over greenhouse gas permitting on Tuesday, ending a long battle between the federal agency and the state.
abstract: Environmental Protection Agency gives Texas Commission on Environmental Quality authority over greenhouse gas permitting, ending long battle between federal agency and state.
lead_paragraph: The Environmental Protection Agency gave Texas authority over greenhouse gas permitting on Tuesday, ending a long battle between the federal agency and the state.

headline.main: Texas: State Gets Power to Grant Emissions Permits
headline.print_headline: Texas: State Gets Power to Grant Emissions Permits
